org.grouplens.lenskit.collections

Class LongUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.LongUtils
  • Deprecated. 
    Replaced by equivalent class in lenskit-core.

    @Deprecated
public final class LongUtils
extends Object

    Utilities for working with longs and collections of them from Fastutil.

    Since:
    2.0
    Compatibility
    Public

      • packedSet

        public static LongSortedSet packedSet(Collection<Long> longs)
        Deprecated. 

        Pack longs into a sorted set.

        Parameters:
        longs - A collection of longs.
        Returns:
        An efficient sorted set containing the numbers in longs.

      • packedSet

        public static LongSortedSet packedSet(long... longs)
        Deprecated. 

        Pack longs into a sorted set.

        Parameters:
        longs - An array of longs. This array is copied, not wrapped.
        Returns:
        An efficient sorted set containing the numbers in longs.

      • asLongCollection

        public static LongCollection asLongCollection(Collection<Long> longs)
        Deprecated. 

        Get a Fastutil LongCollection from a Collection of longs. This method simply casts the collection, if possible, and returns a wrapper otherwise.

        Parameters:
        longs - A collection of longs.
        Returns:
        The collection as a LongCollection.

      • asLongSet

        public static LongSet asLongSet(Set<Long> longs)
        Deprecated. 

        Get a Fastutil LongSet from a Set of longs.

        Parameters:
        longs - The set of longs.
        Returns:
        longs as a fastutil LongSet. If longs is already a LongSet, it is cast.

      • setDifference

        Compute the set difference of two sets.

        Parameters:
        items - The initial set
        exclude - The items to remove
        Returns:

      • randomSubset

        public static LongSet randomSubset(LongSet set,
                                   int num,
                                   Random random)
        Deprecated. 

        Selects a random subset of n longs from a given set of longs. If fewer than n items can be selected the whole set is returned.

        Parameters:
        set - the set of items to select from
        num - The number of random items to add.
        random - a random number generator to be used.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects the items selected by base plus an additional nRandom items.

      • randomSubset

        public static LongSortedSet randomSubset(LongSet set,
                                         int num,
                                         LongSet exclude,
                                         Random rng)
        Deprecated. 

        Selects a random subset of n longs from a given set of longs such that no selected items is in a second set of longs. If fewer than n items can be selected the whole set is returned.

        Parameters:
        set - the set of items to select from
        num - The number of random items to add.
        exclude - a set of longs which must not be returned
        rng - a random number generator to be used.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects the items selected by base plus an additional nRandom items.
